prerequisite.name: Check for valid P/O Statuses
prerequisite.query: SELECT COUNT(pohead_status)=0 FROM pohead WHERE (pohead_status NOT IN ('U','O','C'))
prerequisite.message: One or more purchase order header records (pohead) exist with invalid statuses. Valid statuses are unposted (U),open (O) and closed (C).

prerequisite.name: Check for P/O valid terms
prerequisite.query: SELECT COUNT(*) = 0 FROM pohead LEFT OUTER JOIN terms ON (pohead_terms_id=terms_id) WHERE ((COALESCE(pohead_terms_id,-1) != -1) AND (terms_id IS NULL));
prerequisite.message: One or more purchase order headers exist with invalid terms (pohead_terms_id).

prerequisite.name: Check for valid P/O vendors
prerequisite.query: SELECT COUNT(*) = 0 FROM pohead LEFT OUTER JOIN vendinfo ON (pohead_vend_id=vend_id) WHERE ((pohead_vend_id IS NOT NULL) AND (vend_id IS NULL));
prerequisite.message: One or more purchase order headers exist with invalid vendors (pohead_vend_id).
